name: Good Cook Can Opener, Safe Cut Manual Can Opener, no Sharp Can Edges, Black
short_description: HANDS-FREE LID DISPOSAL: This can top remover lifts the lid off and holds it until you’re ready to dispose of it. Just pivot the handle to release the lid into the trash. There is no need to ever touch the lid to dispose. REUSE LIDS FOR STORAGE: Cut lids have a clean, safe edge that is suitable for short-term storage of leftover food. Pop the lid back on the can and refrigerate until you’re ready to finish your food. NO CROSS CONTAMINATION: With this safe cut can opener, the cutting wheel never contacts the food, so there's no chance of contamination. Open cans with peace of mind, even for messy contents. STURDY CHROME CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from durable chrome, this manual can opener is built to last through years of daily use. It feels substantial in your hand and operates smoothly every time. EFFORTLESS & SECURE: Designed to be safe and easy to use, this smooth-edged can opener cuts efficiently without creating sharp edges. The ergonomic handles provide a firm, comfortable grip.
product_description: Safely and easily open your canned goods with the GoodCook Safe Cut Can Opener. This manual can opener features a unique design that effortlessly opens cans without leaving any sharp edges, and the guide wire lifts the lid from the can once cut fully open so you can safely remove it. Simply rotate the turn knob to release the lid from the opener - with no sharp edges, the lid can be reused as a cover for temporary storage. The durable plastic handle and non-slip turn knob provide a secure grip for additional safety. This handheld can opener is designed with a hardened stainless steel cutting blade and thick stainless steel guide wire for durability and long-lasting use, and it is easy to clean. For over 30 years, GoodCook has created the tools that have made life in the kitchen easier and more enjoyable. As we’ve grown, we strived to stay on trend and continually incorporate more function and value into our kitchenware products. We take pride in the fact that GoodCook products are being used every day, and that our name is recognized as a helpful resource supplying products, recipes and inspiration for home cooks across America.

name: Cuisinart CCO-55 Deluxe, Chrome Electric Can Opener, Silver
short_description: FUNCTIONAL: Cuisinart quality-engineered motor system makes it easy to open any size can with the Power Cut blade STURDY: Base prevents any sliding or tipping EASY CLEAN UP: Removable activation lever for easy cleaning EASY TO USE: Single-touch operation for easy use LIMITED 3-YEAR WARRANTY: Refer to user manual for troubleshooting steps and questions surrounding warranty policies – this product is BPA free
product_description: Style, convenience, and power come together in the Cuisinart electric can opener. With chrome accents and elegant contours, it fits in nicely with other modern countertop appliances. The easy single-touch operation effortlessly opens any standard size can. The precision Power Cut blade and strong magnetic lid holder are attached to the removable lever, which can be easily detached for quick cleanups. Features: Cuisinart quality-engineered motor system|Power Cut blade|Single-touch operation|Sturdy base prevents sliding or tipping|Opens any size can|Removable activation lever for easy cleaning|Limited 3-year warranty|BPA free

name: Hamilton Beach OpenStation Electric Automatic Can Opener for Kitchen with Multi Tool and Bottle and Jar Opening Tools, Auto Shutoff, Cord Storage, and Sure Cut Technology, Stainless Steel (76382)
short_description: OPENS CANS THE FIRST TIME: This automatic can opener has Sure-Cut technology to easily align cans, ensuring cans open the first time, every time. No more struggling with cans when you're in a hurry to get a meal on the table. EXCLUSIVE OPENMATE MULTI-TOOL: The tool opens hard plastic packages and pop-top cans and removes bottle tops and twist-off caps. It stores neatly inside the front of the electric can opener so you never have to search for it. OPEN SMALL AND LARGE JARS — INCLUDES TWO JAR OPENERS: The jar openers are easy to grip, and they nest neatly inside the top of the automatic can opener so they're always on hand when you need them. AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF FOR HANDS-FREE OPERATION: Just align the can and press the lever. The Hamilton Beach can opener opens the can and then shuts off automatically to free your hands for other kitchen tasks. WASHABLE TWIST-OFF CUTTING LEVER: The removable cutting lever with strong magnet twists off for easy cleaning. Just rinse under running water. #1 BRAND IN CAN OPENERS IN THE U.S.*: Consumers love our can openers. We are the best-selling can opener brand in America.
product_description: The Hamilton Beach® OpenStation™ Can Opener with Tools has SureCut™ technology to easily align cans ensuring cans open the first time, every time. It includes an OpenMate™ Multi-Tool and 2 jar openers that store neatly on the can opener.

name: Hamilton Beach Extra-Tall Electric Automatic Can Opener with Easy-Clean Detachable Cutting Lever, Cord Storage, Knife Sharpener, Brushed Stainless Steel (76700)
short_description: EASY TO CLEAN: The washable cutting lever on the electric can opener easily removes to rinse clean under the faucet. OPEN TALLER CANS — EXTRA-TALL DESIGN: With its extra-tall design, this automatic can opener easily opens a wide range of different-sized cans from small to large, including taller cans. AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF. This Hamilton Beach can opener automatically shuts off, freeing your hands for other kitchen tasks. BUILT-IN KNIFE SHARPENER: Keep all your kitchen knives sharp without having to buy a separate sharpening tool. REDUCE CLUTTER: Cord storage at the base of the can opener helps keep countertops and cabinets clutter-free. #1 BRAND IN CAN OPENERS IN THE U.S.*: Consumers love our can openers. We are the best-selling can opener brand in America.
product_description: Clear out your drawer full of kitchen gadgets – this Hamilton Beach can opener not only opens cans from small to large, it also has a built-in knife sharpener. With an extra-tall design, you can easily fit larger cans under the stainless steel, electric cutting blade. The cutting unit automatically shuts off once it’s done and removes for easy cleaning. The cord fits into its own area for neat storage.

name: Rösle Stainless Steel Can Opener with Pliers Grip, 7-inch
short_description: EASY CAN OPENING: Easy positioning pliers grip securely onto the top of the can, effortlessly lifting the lid without ever touching the food inside, featuring an ergonomically shaped thumbscrew, for smooth and comfortable turning, reducing strain on your hands and wrists. STAINLESS STEEL: Constructed with high-quality 18/10 premium stainless steel, ensuring durability and longevity for long-lasting use, featuring pliers to help lift the lid off the can. SAFE CUTTING WHEEL: The lateral cutting wheel is designed to prevent sharp edges along the rim and lid of the can, enhancing safety during use and also allowing the lid to fit back on top of the can. FOR BEGINNERS TO MASTERS: Cooking and baking have never been easier when Rosle Cookware utensils are involved, providing true cooking enjoyment featuring products for beginners to chefs. A pan for every occasion and kitchen tools that become wonderful helpers. MODERN, YET CLASSIC: From kitchen to table, Rosle provides the tools needed for serving and preparing any meal, whether cooking for one on the bbq, to a professional chef in a restaurant, the quality is showcased in its thoughtful design.
product_description: Manufactured entirely from stainless steel. This tin opener opens any tin easily, and leaves no sharp edges. The opener cleanly cuts the lid of the can allowing you to use the lid again for storage. The grip handle also allows for easy use to open any type of can.

name: Caraway Can Opener - Non Toxic Stainless Steel - Essential Kitchen Tool - Ergonomic Handle
short_description: KITCHEN ESSENTIAL: This evenly-weighted premium stainless steel can opener is designed for smooth opening. PREMIUM QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: Crafted with non-toxic stainless steel to ensure durability and safety, free from plastics or BPA. Enjoy long-lasting performance with corrosion-resistant materials. ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR EFFORTLESS USE: Ergonomic handles mean you can pierce lids using minimal force, while the blade creates a clean edge, saving you time and headaches. SUSTAINABLE & STYLISH: Elevate your kitchen aesthetics with our premium line of stainless steel kitchen gadgets that combine functionality with elegance. These gadgets are built to last, ensuring you enjoy sustainable cooking experiences for years to come. COMPLETE THE SET: Look out for the entire Caraway Kitchen Gadget line, which includes the Pizza Cutter, Garlic Press, Ice Cream Scoop, Vegetable Peeler, and Can Opener.

name: KitchenAid No Mess Multi Function Can Opener, One size, Gray
short_description: EASY, SMOOTH OPENING EVERY TIME: Equipped with a durable, razor-sharp stainless steel cutting wheel, this can opener pierces cans easily and slices smoothly for a hassle-free experience. EFFORTLESS TURNING KNOB: The oversized, easy-to-turn knob offers a secure grip, allowing you to open cans with minimal effort and maximum control, ideal for users with limited hand strength. SOFT, ERGONOMIC HANDLES FOR COMFORT: Designed with oversized, ergonomic handles that provide a comfortable and secure grip, minimizing hand strain and making it easy to open cans of any size. 2-IN-1 MULTIFUNCTIONAL TOOL: This tool is equipped with a built-in bottle opener, allowing you to easily remove caps in one convenient design, saving space in your kitchen. VERSATILE FOR EVERYDAY USE: Suitable for a wide range of can and bottle sizes, this opener is designed to be a reliable, go-to tool in any kitchen, whether you’re opening soup cans or beverage bottles.
product_description: The KitchenAid No Mess Multifunction Can Opener features a razor-sharp, high-carbon steel blade that easily pierces and slices through any sized can with a smooth, continuous cut. The magnet in the end of the handle allows for easy, no-touch removal and disposal of can lids, while the oversized, easy-crank knob allows for effortless opening with just a few turns. The ergonomic handles are well balanced to ensure maximum comfort and smooth operation, and the sturdy design stands up to daily use. Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent. Rinse and dry immediately.

name: Can Punch Bottle Opener, Manual Stainless Steel Can Opener 1 Pack
short_description: One side is a bottle opener, the other is a can opener High-quality stainless steel and comfortable plastic handle Great for camping or traveling Measures 6.1 inch/15.5cm, compact to carry and store Dishwasher safe

name: OXO SteeL Can Opener
short_description: Features sharp, stainless-steel blades Oversized knob turns easily without much effort Large handles have cushioned touch points that absorb pressure Built-in bottle opener comes in handy anywhere Can be used by left- and right-handed home cooks
product_description: A well-stocked pantry is a home cook’s secret weapon. Which makes the OXO Steel Can Opener an absolute must have: It’s the ideal tool for opening up cans of beans, peeled tomatoes, veggies, and other canned goods. It has sharp, stainless steel blades, an oversized knob that’s easy to turn, and large handles with cushioned touch points that absorb pressure. Plus, it has a built-in bottle opener for built-in convenience. Hand wash only.

name: Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Can Opener Manual and Bottle Opener with Magnet, Oversized Handle & Large Turn Knob, Multifunctional Kitchen Essentials for Seniors, Sharp Blade & Smooth Edge, Blue
short_description: High Quality & Excellent Cutting: Our manual can opener delivers exceptional durability and long-lasting performance. The food-grade stainless steel cutting wheels on the can opener ensure food safety, while razor-sharp high-carbon steel blades guarantee effortless cutting. Precision-engineered gears work seamlessly with the blade, ensuring smooth lid removal with each rotation Smooth Edges for Safety: This heavy duty can opener creates perfectly smooth edges every time, with a safety-first design that removes sharp edges as it cuts. The sharp blade moves smoothly around the lid, leaving no dangerous metal bits behind—so you can safely reach into the can without worrying about cuts Built-In Magnet: Our stainless steel can opener features a built-in high-strength suction magnet with an anti-slip fluted base, ensuring secure attachment and eliminating accidental detachment. After cleanly cutting through the lid, the magnet effortlessly lifts it away. This hygienic and convenient design makes lifting lids an effortless task Large Knob & Rubber Handle: The handheld can opener with magnet boasts an oversized rotating knob designed for effortless operation. Its non-slip rubber coating on both the handle and knob ensures a secure, comfortable grip, preventing hand slippage even with greasy hands. This manual can opener is ideal for seniors and people with arthritis Multipurpose Performance: Engineered for versatility, our multifunctional smooth edge can opener integrates a precision-built bottle opener that effortlessly handles crown caps on beer, soda. This all-in-one kitchen gadget transitions seamlessly between: cutting cans with precision, serving as bottle opener, and prying open containers. Rinse under warm soapy water after use and dry thoroughly with a clean towel to maintain optimal performance
